title: @johnmarkofficial on the symbolism of Wolverine
description:
A clip from Part 2 of my discussion with @johnmarkofficial on grappling with the formative power & moral complexities of hunter-hero myths. Out wherever you subscribe to podcasts 4.18.23

https://open.spotify.com/show/0Lgkn9W8V2YHnPkEsluysm?si=cd78048a04e64a58
